Startup viewsÂ¶

(cubicweb.web.views.startup)

The usual selectors are no_rset or yes. These views don’t apply to a result set.

index
This view defines the home page of your application. It does not require a result set to apply to.
schema
A view dedicated to the display of the schema of the instance
